pr_title: rls: use system property to use direct path for oob channel

timeline.message: rls: use system property to use direct path for oob channel

timeline.bodyText: You probably want to make system property more "static" to your program. That is, the system property should be read when your code is loaded instead of when this method is executed.
timeline.author: voidzcy

timeline.bodyText: I think your code does not call this method, so no need to override.
timeline.author: dapengzhang0
